attributes.action: 10% pay rise for military, emergency services staff and care workers
attributes.additional_details:
The military have been overdue for a pay rise for a very long as they are constantly risking their lives to protect our nation.

With the COVID -19 outbreak all emergency services and care workers have proven that they go above and beyond, and don't get as much as they deserve.
attributes.background:
The government/parliament needs to realise the importance of taking care the people who take care of all of us.

They deserve more and we should give them more.

rejection.details:
The Government isn't responsible for setting the pay of social care workers, beyond setting the minimum wage. You may wish to sign these petitions instead: 

Increase the minimum wage for social care staff:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/316909

Fund a pay rise for public sector workers: 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/315198
